channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Data Protection Advisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Data Protection Advisor

item.title: CVE-2019-18582|2024-08-05T01:54:14.475Z -- dell -- data%20protection%20advisor
item.description: Dell EMC Data Protection Advisor versions 6.3, 6.4, 6.5, 18.2 versions prior to patch 83, and 19.1 versions prior to patch 71 contain a server-side template injection vulnerability in the REST API. A remote authenticated malicious user with administrative privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious report generation scripts in the server. This may lead to OS command execution as the regular user runs the DPA service on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2019-18581|2024-08-05T01:54:14.426Z -- dell -- data%20protection%20advisor
item.description: Dell EMC Data Protection Advisor versions 6.3, 6.4, 6.5, 18.2 versions prior to patch 83, and 19.1 versions prior to patch 71 contain a server missing authorization vulnerability in the REST API. A remote authenticated malicious user with administrative privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to alter the applicationâ€™s allowable list of OS commands. This may lead to arbitrary OS command execution as the regular user runs the DPA service on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2024-28974|2024-08-02T01:03:51.336Z -- dell -- data%20protection%20advisor
item.description: Dell Data Protection Advisor, version(s) 19.9, contain(s) an Inadequate Encryption Strength vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with remote access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-28974|2024-06-06T15:34:46.039Z -- dell -- data%20protection%20advisor
item.description: Dell Data Protection Advisor, version(s) 19.9, contain(s) an Inadequate Encryption Strength vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with remote access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Denial of service.
